articles.title: David Penberthy Calls Out Andrew McLeod Over Crows Comments - FiveAA
articles.description: FIVEaa’s David Penberthy says Andrew McLeod’s comments that “something is wrong” at the Adelaide Crows are hurting the club and are difficult to understand given the “generosity showered” on him by Adelaide FC. Speaking on Friday’s FIVEaa breakfast show Penbo…

articles.author: Alicia Newton
articles.title: NRL to investigate Bulldogs over COVID-19 protocols breach - NRL.COM
articles.description: The NRL will investigate handshakes between Canterbury Bulldogs club great Terry Lamb and players which appears to breach COVID-19 protocols, with Lamb now to be tested for the virus.
